business_name: MachinesDealer - Used Offset Printing Machines Dealer

reviews.author: Banty Kumar
reviews.text: I highly recommend Machine Dealer for their professionalism. I got a Heidelberg SM 102 V from them, and it was in very good condition. They provided timely delivery and excellent customer support. Their team is professional and supportive; they are highly recommended if anyone is looking for affordable printing machines

reviews.author: Md Gayasuddin
reviews.text: Recently bought a Heidelberg SM 102 F from Machines Dealer. The machine was in excellent condition and delivered with care. The team was supportive throughout the process. Highly satisfied with their services.

reviews.author: Irshad Khan
reviews.text: Purchased a Heidelberg SM 74-6+L from Machines Dealer and couldn't be happier. The machine was well-maintained, and they provided excellent customer service. Highly recommend them for anyone in need of offset printing machines
